title: Furnished Short Term Rental  •   Wifi + Hydro
description:
Student? Recent graduate? Young professional? If you're looking for worry-free living, Envie is the place to live! Located in Little Italy, Envie is steps away from the O-train and close to buses to take you anywhere you need to go. Minutes from Bayview station, Carleton U, and the downtown core!


You can enjoy all that Envie has to offer including

• New modern furnishings

• Stainless steel appliances

• In-suite laundry facilities

• Weekly yoga classes, muay thai, and fitness boot camp classes

• Fitness gym and yoga studio

• Shared penthouse space with amazing views

• Grocery Bus

• 24/7 Reception and Security


For more information, to reserve your suite, or book your tour – please call us at (613) 222-7622.

title: University, College & Young Professional Accommodation In Ottawa
description:
For students living in the National Capital Region, Saint Paul University Residence is the place to be. No other accommodations in the area offer the opportunity to meet and interact with students from three different institutions of higher learning. Here you will find students from Saint Paul University, the University of Ottawa as well as Carleton University. Want to live close to downtown as well as your classes? Then, Saint Paul University Residence is the place for you.


Suite Features

Oversized double bed (54" by 80")

Kitchenette with sink, microwave and refrigerator

Private three-piece bathroom within each suite

Large desk and work area

High-speed Internet access (following Saint Paul University usage policies)

Private phone line with voice mail and local access

Television with cable in each room

Air-conditioned suites

Light housekeeping service

Barrier-free suite available for students with physical limitations


Security

Controlled-access building

Front desk staffed 24 hours a day

On-site management

All common rooms and hallways are video recorded

Sign-in policy enforced for all guests


Advantages

The Residence is a secure building with controlled-access entry and video-recorded common areas

Accommodations come fully furnished

Laundry, kitchen & BBQ facilities

Regular social and educational activities organized by the Residence Life Staff

Environmentally friendly smoke-free facility

24-hour customer service counter

Proximity to class means more study time and less travel time

Pay only for your academic year and avoid a 12-month lease

Eliminate hassles with deposits for utilities and phone or with roommates who do not pay their share

With so many other residents in one location, it is easy to get together to form study groups and complete team assignments

Study in your room or in any of the many Residence common lounges, or use the University resources located just steps away

title: Student Bedroom 4 Rent close 2 Tunney's & Agriculture Farm
description:
*ONLY AVAILABLE TO CO-OP / INTERNSHIP STUDENTS* *AVAILABLE MAY 1*


I am renting out a total of three basement bedrooms in a bungalow close to the Fisher – Meadowlands intersection. All the bedrooms measure between 190 and 100 square feet and are furnished with a bed, desk and chair. You would be sharing a washroom with two other roommates. I am the owner of the house and I live on the ground floor of the bungalow. The kitchen, living room, and sunroom are all shared so you would have full access to all these spots. The rooms are available for rent starting May 1 until the end of August.


Other features:

*plenty of space in the driveway for a car

*garage for storage

*all utilities are included in the monthly rent

*laundry room with a washer and dryer

*wifi internet (unlimited downloading, 75mbps)


The house is located close to the following locations:

*Tunney’s Pasture (Health Canada and Stats Canada)

*Agriculture Farm (Agriculture & Agri-Food Canada, CFIA)

*Carleton University


If you are interested in renting the place, please get in contact with me. The best way to reach me is via email and text. I have a 1-minute video of the house which I can send via WhatsApp to anyone who is unable to see the place in person.

title: Room for rent starting MARCH 1st
description:
Looking for mature female students to take over a lease starting March 1st. Utilities and wifi are extra, parking is available but also extra, room is unfurnished. Pet friendly.
15min walk or 5min bus from Carleton University with 7 bus stop infront of house. 30 min bus to Ottawa University or downtown with 6 and 7 stop 2min walk from house. Shoppers 2min walk and Lansdowne 10min walk

title: Beautifully furnished house for student group from Sep 1
description:
Great location for Carleton Students! Short ride to Carleton University. I am looking for a group of 5 responsible students to rent this beautiful and spacious semi-detached house. The house has 7 sunny bedrooms ( 2 Carleton students renew lease so 5 rooms available). Each room is fully furnished with bed (frame + mattress), nightstand, desk, office chair and closet. It has spacious bright living room, one full eat-in kitchen and one newly finished kitchenette in basement. 2.5 beautifully finished bathrooms and lot of storage space in basement. Wifi, Stove, 2 large refrigerators, 1 large freezer, washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, 2 microwaves, central A/C and more. Group Rent $2500 /month + utility, starting from Sep 1, 2020.


Note: Pet is not allowed and 1 year lease is required.

For fast response, Text or call anytime at 613-8082721.

title: All Inclusive Room Steps to Algonquin & Transit
description:
Great opportunity to live in this fully renovated unit perfectly located just off the Transitway and steps away from Algonquin college. We are looking for 1 more female professional/student to occupy this gorgeous 4 bedroom, 2 bath apartment.

This unit features hardwood and ceramic flooring, LED lighting, a brand new huge kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, in unit laundry, central air conditioning, and loads of natural sunlight!

This unit boasts an incredible location right off the highway. Walk to the shops and restaurants at College Square, IKEA, and Algonquin College. Take a 10 minute walk to Iris station and hop on a quick bus to Carleton or Ottawa U via the Transitway.

Heat, internet, hydro, water, snow removal, and lawn care included. Room can be furnished if needed for additional fee. No smoking, no animals. Parking available at $50/ month. Students welcome with parental co sign. Book a viewing today!

Large living/dining area, kitchen, full bath, laundry room, A/C, BBQ, 2nd bath downstairs. Storage shed for bikes.

Steps away from major bus routes.

Co-op / Intern students welcome.

title: Student Room: private entrance, private kitchen, private bath
description:
Student Room: private entrance, private kitchen, private bath

Private student room with private entrance, private bathroom as well as an in-unit kitchen (not shared).

This unit is perfect for busy students of University of Ottawa or students of Cite Collegiale looking for private accommodations in a beautiful part of the city with walking access to stores and convenient buses to the university.

Located in a safe and quiet neighbourhood with buses, grocery store, drug store, shopping mall, parks and bike paths within walking distance.

The room and kitchen is furnished with a full size refrigerator, toaster oven, stove top, microwave, toaster, cutlery and utensils, kitchen table and chairs, a desk, a dresser, large mirror, and a single bed. Some of the furniture could be moved if requested.

The rent is $600 per month and includes utilities, including electricity, heat, water, and internet.

The unit is available for one student tenant only.

No parking available. Bus #94 directly to the University of Ottawa and Buses #94 and #129 to La Cite Collegiale.

Thank you for your interest.

location.mapAddress: 131 Sai Crescent, Ottawa, ON K1G 5P1, Canada

title: One Bedroom in Two Bedroom Apartment
description:
LOOKING FOR FEMALE ROOMATE – MAY 1st 2020


I am a student at Algonquin College and I am looking for a female roommate to share my two bedroom, apartment with come May. I live in an apartment complex located at Baseline and Navaho (15 minute walk from Algonquin and maybe a 2 minute bus ride) and would need someone to be able to begin paying the other half of the rent as of May 1st of this year. The apartment is on the second floor, and there are stairs and an elevator in the building, close to both entrances. The rent fee is roughly $675 per month, and this includes utilities. Laundry and internet are not included in the rental fee, however there is a laundry unit on site and the internet would be about $65 per month total (will be split between us) The shared spaces are furnished, and I will have dishes for the kitchen but you will be responsible for furnishing your bedroom. The apartment does offer tenant parking for $50 per month (I believe that is an accurate price) and it is also pet friendly. I do have a Rottweiler/German Shepherd dog who is a puppy at the moment but will be big, so large dogs would have to be in your comfort zone – she is very friendly and loves anybody who gives her any sort of attention, not aggressive in any way shape or form. I am basically looking to share all expenses (rent, groceries, laundry, internet etc) with another female student or just a responsible person. I will be working most of next year, however the following year I am hoping to return full-time to school in an intense program and need a responsible roommate that won’t cause distraction from my studies and who is also diligent about paying rent/internet/groceries.

If you are interested please feel free to message me and we can sort out further details and I would be happy to answer any questions you may have. Thanks!!

title: Carleton U, Algonquin College, Co-op Student 2 Rooms Avail May 1
description: This is a beautiful 5 bedroom raised ranch home in a quiet area, very clean and well-maintained. Parking for 2 cars. Two bedrooms available May 1. Co-op Students welcome 4 or 12 month lease available. House is perfectly located on a bus route and within walking distance to Algonquin College or Carleton University – 15 min walk. Close to Grocery Stores, Banks, Tim Horton’s, Transportation, Parks, Mooney’s Bay Beach, Canal, Bike paths and other amenities. House features are: fully furnished home, hardwood floors throughout the house, kitchen, living room and dining rooms are on main level, air conditioning, 2 full bathrooms, 5 appliances, plus a large chest freezer in Laundry room, Hydro, water, gas, internet and Bell TV are included . There is also access to private backyard and BBQ. This is a great place to live – you will not be disappointed! Please contact Gordon Maclean at gordon.maclean1@sympatico.ca or on my cell at 905 407 0361 for further information

title: 57 Bayswater: Apartment for rent in Hintonburg
description: Welcome to 57 Bayswater in Hintonburg, Ottawa! Nestled in the centre of Hintonburg, our trendy and creative community is home to students, professionals and families who enjoy being close to all the opportunities Hintonburg has to offer!HINTONBURG OTTAWA APARTMENTSIn addition to a great neighbourhood, we offer:Bachelor apartments, 1 bedroom apartments and two bedroom apartments, gorgeous views from private balconies, laminate and ceramic flooring throughout, on-site laundry and fitness facility and easy access to public transportation and biking trails. All of these features and a winning location in the middle of vibrant neighbourhood make 57 Bayswater the perfect place to live.Our spacious apartments offer the right fit for any lifestyle, whether you're a college student attending Algonquin College, a professional who works in the downtown core, or a family that enjoys living in a dynamic neighbourhood close to numerous parks and cultural outlets.Every one of our apartments holds the high-end amenities you've come to expect from city living. Our apartments are outfitted with hardwood, laminate and ceramic tile throughout, giving each layout a modern feel. The views from each unit's private balcony are breathtaking.Call 57 Bayswater at 613-518-1308 today and set up a tour!Utilities Included:HeatWaterProperty AmenitiesSecure EntranceLaundry FacilitiesElevatorStorage Available Crime Free Certified Building24 Hour Emergency ServiceFitness CentreSuite AmenitiesFridgeStoveCeramic FloorsRenovatedRooftop PatioLaminate FloorsPet FriendlyBalconyHardwood AvailableFreshly PaintedDishwasher*E&OE. Pricing subject to change and finishing may vary, contact Customer Care Coordinator for more info.

title: 3 Bedroom Near Ottawa University in Sandy Hill
description: This 3 bedroom 1 bath townhouse has been a popular student rental for over 10 years, and Ottawa University students are not only welcome - they are preferred! There is a fridge, stove, washer, and dryer provided (no coin laundry). The basement is unfinished storage only. There is a parking spot available for an additional charge. There is a small yard, and it's minutes to the Lees LRT station. Utilities can be included for an additional $250/month. Showings start next Monday< March 2nd - contact landlord for booking a time.

description:

We live in a brand new 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath town-house(bulit by Cardel) in the beautiful Blackstone development in Kanata. Hardwood flooring throughout the open concept main floor, with large windows for extra light. Finished basement. 1 car garage + 2 car driveway. We are minutes away from Walmart Superstore, Sobey's Groceries, Kanata Centrum, Tanger Outlets, CTC Centre and many other shops and stores.

title: University, College & Young Professional Accommodation In Ottawa
description:
For students living in the National Capital Region, Saint Paul University Residence is the place to be. No other accommodations in the area offer the opportunity to meet and interact with students from three different institutions of higher learning. Here you will find students from Saint Paul University, the University of Ottawa as well as Carleton University. Want to live close to downtown as well as your classes? Then, Saint Paul University Residence is the place for you.


Suite Features

Oversized double bed (54" by 80")

Kitchenette with sink, microwave and refrigerator

Private three-piece bathroom within each suite

Large desk and work area

High-speed Internet access (following Saint Paul University usage policies)

Private phone line with voice mail and local access

Television with cable in each room

Air-conditioned suites

Light housekeeping service

Barrier-free suite available for students with physical limitations


Security

Controlled-access building

Front desk staffed 24 hours a day

On-site management

All common rooms and hallways are video recorded

Sign-in policy enforced for all guests


Advantages

The Residence is a secure building with controlled-access entry and video-recorded common areas

Accommodations come fully furnished

Laundry, kitchen & BBQ facilities

Regular social and educational activities organized by the Residence Life Staff

Environmentally friendly smoke-free facility

24-hour customer service counter

Proximity to class means more study time and less travel time

Pay only for your academic year and avoid a 12-month lease

Eliminate hassles with deposits for utilities and phone or with roommates who do not pay their share

With so many other residents in one location, it is easy to get together to form study groups and complete team assignments

Study in your room or in any of the many Residence common lounges, or use the University resources located just steps away

location.mapAddress: 101 Champagne Ave S, Ottawa, ON K1S 4P4, Canada

title: KANATA AND OTTAWA BOARDROOM OR MEETING SPACE AVAILABLE FOR RENT
description:
At Accountapotamus Inc., we've successfully taught thousands of students all things Accounting, Bookkeeping and Quickbooks; teaching our programs in our hometown of Ottawa on a monthly basis, but also in cities and towns all across Ontario. According to Intuit, we are the largest Quickbooks Desktop trainer in the province.


We know how frustrating and time-consuming it can be trying to find a professional, clean and reliable space for meetings or courses that fits your budget and meets your needs. We get it. That’s why we built our own.


In our new Kanata office, we have a gorgeous meeting room full of natural light and a boardroom-style table that comfortably fits 10 people with additional seating available. There is a small break-out area with a large granite surface, perfect for lunch breaks, and we are more than happy to provide coffee, tea and water at no extra cost. We also include the use of our projector and whiteboards for your convenience.


COST:			

$175+HST/day or $100/half day + HST


SIZE:	

Comfortably seats 10 boardroom-style, with additional seating available and a small break-out area (total 324 sqft)


AVAILABILITY:		

8:00 am - 4:00 pm/Monday-Friday

Flexible: evenings & weekends available upon request


INCLUDED/FREE:	

Coffee/tea/water

Use of projector & whiteboards

Wifi

Parking


LOCATION: 		

Accountapotamus Inc.

235 Terence Matthews Cres., Suite 100

Kanata ON K2M 2B3


OTHER: 	

Laptops are available to rent onsite, for $50 each/day (plus HST).


CANCELLATION:	

Bookings will be confirmed upon receipt of payment. In the case of cancellations, a full refund will be made where either one week of notice is provided or in the event that we are able to re-book the space.


ENQUIRIES:		

Myriah Saulnier

services@accountapotamus.com

613-656-0441 x441

It comes with its own side entrance. Two boys from Carlton University are living other two rooms. Three people share a bathroom, kitchen and laundry.

Walk in 3 minutes to bus route 111 and 86 stop. Bus 111 directly goes to Carlton University, Algonquin College, Billings Bridge shopping center and College Square shopping center. Bus 86 directly goes to O–Train Tunney’s Pasture Station. Walking distance to shopping, banks and dining. Close to Merivale Mall.

Key Features: - All inclusive utilities (Hydro, Gas, Water, Heater), central AC. - FREE on site Laundry (Washer/Dryer) for your own use. - Unlimited Hi-speed Wireless Internet. - Door locks are provided on each room. - Safe neighborhood.

$600 per room per person monthly, all inclusive.

One year lease needed.

No smoking and pets please.

I'm a 4th-year student at Carleton, studying Criminology and I'm looking for a roommate to fill the upstairs bedroom in a 2 bedroom apartment as my roommate now is heading off to Law School in Toronto.

I'm a quiet, clean, and respectful student. I'm either in class, or working, so I'm rarely home.

Rent is $1,025/month. All utilities included. Laundry is in the basement. No parking. Air conditioning included in each bedroom.
